mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Quest(BoardNo,Title,Context,Writer, SavedFilePath, RealFilePath) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{title}, #{context}, #{writer}, #{savedFilePath}, #{realFilePath});
INSERT INTO QPicture(QuestNo, SavedFilePath, RealFilePath, Writer) VALUES (#{questNo}, #{savedFilePath}, #{realFilePath}, #{writer} );
INSERT INTO QuestTag(TagNo, QuestNo) VALUES (#{ tagNo }, #{questNo} );
mapper.select: SELECT Quest.QuestNo, Quest.BoardNo, Quest.Title, Quest.Context, Quest.RegDate, Quest.Writer, Quest.ViewCount, Quest.GoodCount, Quest.Deleted, Quest.SavedFilePath, Quest.RealFilePath, Tag.TagName, Tag.TagNo FROM Quest, Tag, QuestTag WHERE Quest.QuestNo = QuestTag.QuestNo and QuestTag.TagNo = Tag.TagNo ORDER BY QuestNo DESC

SELECT Quest.QuestNo, Quest.BoardNo, Quest.Title, Quest.Context, Quest.RegDate, Quest.Writer, Quest.ViewCount, Quest.GoodCount, Quest.Deleted, Quest.SavedFilePath, Quest.RealFilePath, Tag.TagName FROM Quest, Tag, QuestTag WHERE Quest.QuestNo = QuestTag.QuestNo and QuestTag.TagNo = Tag.TagNo and Tag.TagNo = #{ tagNo } ORDER BY QuestNo DESC
SELECT TagNo, TagName, TagType FROM Tag
SELECT QPictureNo, SavedFilePath, RealFilePath, RegDate, QuestNo FROM QPicture

SELECT Quest.QuestNo, Quest.BoardNo, Quest.Title, Quest.Context, Quest.RegDate, Quest.Writer, Quest.ViewCount, Quest.GoodCount, Quest.Deleted, Quest.SavedFilePath, Quest.RealFilePath, Tag.TagName, Tag.TagNo FROM Quest INNER JOIN QuestTag ON QuestTag.QuestNo = Quest.QuestNo INNER JOIN Tag ON Tag.TagNo = QuestTag.TagNo WHERE Quest.QuestNo NOT IN (SELECT QuestNo FROM Answer) ORDER BY Quest.QuestNo DESC
SELECT BOARDNO, QUESTNO, TITLE, CONTEXT, REGDATE, WRITER, VIEWCOUNT, GOODCOUNT, DELETED FROM QUEST
SELECT BoardNo,QuestNo,Title,Context,RegDate,Writer,ViewCount,GoodCount,Deleted FROM Quest WHERE Deleted =0 ORDER BY RegDate DESC LIMIT #{ start }, #{ end };
